comments.body: Would it be possible to set `gcr.io/google-containers/ubuntu-slim-GOARCH:0.12` here and replace GOARCH dynamically?

In the absence of `BASEIMAGE` I'm considering building image for all supported archs like - `amd64, arm, arm64, ppc64le, s390x` and this suits only images based on scratch where we dependent only on the binary image which are packaging.

In the above case I don't want to build this image for `s390x` platform because I'm facing issues while running cross platform using qemu.

So IMO we should have some flexibility to disable any image for any given architecture in the future.

@luxas the pattern I've seen in the repo seems to be using `BASEIMAGE` in the Dockerfile, regardless of whether there's a simple pattern for the base image (as is the case with our custom base images). I'm fine with continuing this pattern.
